Articles.Content: Wouldn't it be really cool if some amazing coder (definitely not me) could make a KSP animator application a bit like that one for minecraft

If you mean the Animation Studio thing where it included Minecraft models and stuff then no. I think if people want to make KSP animations they should rig everything themselves, rather than be limited to the ones that somebody else made.

Well, you know i do KSP animations....

It's 3D animation. and it's not super good...

You can just search "rew dew" on youtube, and i should be the first channel that pops up.
He means an animator program that you can make your own animations in.
